mapper.select: select user_id from user where user_email=#{uEmail}
mapper.update: update user set user_token=concat(user_email,'?id=',cast(user_id AS char)) where user_email=#{uEmail}

mapper.select: select * from user_todolist where task_userid=#{task_userid} and task_id=#{taskId}
mapper.insert: insert into user_todolist(task_userid, task_content, task_type, task_createtime,task_finishtime) values (#{task_userid},#{task_content},0,now(),null)
mapper.update: update user_todolist set task_content=#{task_content} where task_userid=#{task_userid} and task_id=#{taskId}
